nodeList.loreText: The forest will go to war to keep its inhabitants safe
nodeList.nodeDescription: Summons a totem that fires thorns at nearby enemies.

nodeList.altText: You can only regain mana from Thorn Totems that were summoned directly.
nodeList.description: You regain mana when a thorn totem dies or is unsummoned.

node.description: Summon Thorn Totem costs less mana.

node.loreText: The forest will go to war to keep its inhabitants safe
node.nodeDescription: Summons a totem that fires thorns at nearby enemies.

node.description: You can have additional Thorn Totems active, but Summon Thorn Totem costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: You can have up to one additional thorn totem at a time per point. Summon thorn totem can hold one additional charge per point. [40%] increased mana cost per point.

node.loreText: The forest will go to war to keep its inhabitants safe
node.nodeDescription: Summons a totem that fires thorns at nearby enemies.

nodeList.altText: This scales with your attunement, not the attunement of your totems.
nodeList.description: Thorn Totem has a higher chance to freeze enemies, and a greater chance to freeze enemies for each point of Attunement you have.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Thorn totems have +25% freeze rate multiplier.

Thorn totem has a +5% freeze rate multiplier for each point of Attunement.

node.altText:
If a thorn totem would leave a poison cloud on death, it instead leaves an ice vortex, the damage of which scales with the totem's increases to cold damage, spell damage, and damage over time.

Freeze rate grants a chance to freeze based on the enemy's health.
node.description:
Thorn Totem's thorns gain a chance to freeze and 50% of their base physical damage is converted to cold damage. Consequently its damage now also scales with increases to cold damage.

All poison chance from this tree is converted to chill chance, and all increases poison duration from this tree apply to chill duration instead.
node.nodeDescription:
Converts all poison chance to chill chance, and increased poison duration to increased chill duration.

Thorn totems can freeze enemies on hit, with a freeze rate of 10.

node.description: Thorn Totem spells deal additional spell cold damage.
node.nodeDescription: Thorn totems have +[4] spell cold damage per point

node.description: Thorn Totem attacks deal more spell damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but their projectiles travel more slowly.
node.nodeDescription: Thorn totems deal [18%] more spell damage (multiplicative with other bonuses) per point, but have [10%] reduced projectile speed per point.

node.description: Thorn Totem releases additional thorns.
node.nodeDescription: Thorn totems fire [1] additional thorn in each burst per point

nodeList.altText: Thorn totems that would be created in innaccessible locations are not created at all, but still increase the mana cost.
nodeList.description: You summon your maximum number of Thorn Totems at once in a ring around the target location, but your maximum number of Thorn Totems is reduced and Summon Thorn Totem costs additional mana per additional totem summoned.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
You summon your maximum number of thorn totems at once in a ring around the target location.

Summon thorn totem cannot have additional charges and has 100% increased cooldown duration. 50% reduced summoning speed.
